subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Richard Gasquet, the No. 21 seed, upset No. 4 Stan Wawrinka in five sets to join No. 1 Novak Djokovic, No. 2 Roger Federer and No. 3 Andy Murray in the Wimbledon semifinals.
snippet: Richard Gasquet, the No. 21 seed, upset No. 4 Stan Wawrinka in five sets to join No. 1 Novak Djokovic, No. 2 Roger Federer and No. 3 Andy Murray in the Wimbledon semifinals.
